mapper.select: select name, flag, image, comments, latitude, longitude, zindex, fk_category from tbl_world A join tbl_world_detail B on A.category = B.fk_category order by zindex

select category, category_seq, substr(category,5) as categoryname from tbl_schedule A join tbl_schedule_detail B on A.seq_schedule = B.fk_seq_schedule join tbl_schedule_detail2 C on b.seq_schedule_detail = C.fk_schedule_detail where seq_schedule = #{seq} order by fk_category, category
select name, flag, days , fk_category from tbl_schedule A join tbl_schedule_detail B on A.seq_schedule = B.fk_seq_schedule join tbl_world C on B.fk_category = C.category where seq_schedule = #{seq}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_schedule(seq_schedule, fk_userid, title, startDay, registerday, imageArr) values(seq_tbl_schedule.nextval, #{userid}, #{title}, to_date(#{startDay} , 'yyyy-mm-dd'), default, #{imgArr})
insert into tbl_schedule_detail(seq_schedule_detail, fk_seq_schedule, fk_category, days) values(seq_schedule_detail.nextval, #{seq}, #{world}, #{days})
insert into tbl_schedule_detail2(seq_schedule_detail2, fk_schedule_detail, category, category_seq) values(seq_schedule_detail2.nextval, #{seq}, #{category}, #{categoryseq})
insert into tbl_scheduler(seq_scheduler, fk_schedule, schedule,transfer) values(seq_tbl_scheduler.nextval, #{seq}, '','')
